title: Strawberry Glazed Ribs

asset.author: Camp Chef
asset.hookText:
Ingredients:
1) Rack of Ribs
2) Olive Oil
3) Your Favorite Rib Rub
4) Apple Juice
5) Strawberry Jam (small jar)
6) Butter (1/4 cup)

Step 1) Prepare your ribs by removing the membrane
Step 2) Lightly coat with olive oil
Step 3) Heavily coat with your favorite seasoning or rub 
Step 4) Smoke at 275 degrees for 4 hours
Step 5) After 2 hours spritz with apple juice and again at 3 hours
Step 6) Reduce strawberry jam on medium heat, then mix in butter
Step 7) Glaze ribs with sauce at 4 hours, finish smoking for 10 more minutes

www.CampChef.com
